SEARCH
Package uk.blankaspect.common.jsonxml

Class JsonGeneratorXml.Builder

java.lang.Object
uk.blankaspect.common.jsonxml.JsonGeneratorXml.Builder
Enclosing class:
JsonGeneratorXml
public static class JsonGeneratorXml.Builder extends Object
This class implements a builder for a JSON generator.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    JsonGeneratorXml
    build()
    Creates and returns a new instance of a JSON generator that is initialised from the state of this builder.
    JsonGeneratorXml.Builder
    elementFacade(IElementFacade elementFacade)
    Sets the interface through which the name and value attributes of JSON-XML elements are accessed.
    JsonGeneratorXml.Builder
    indentIncrement(int indentIncrement)
    Sets the number of spaces by which indentation is increased from one level to the next.
    JsonGeneratorXml.Builder
    maxLineLength(int maxLineLength)
    Sets the maximum length of a line of JSON text without wrapping.
    JsonGeneratorXml.Builder
    newLineBeforeLeftBracket(NewLineBeforeLeftBracket newLineBeforeLeftBracket)
    Sets the circumstance in which a new line is written before the opening bracket of a JSON array or the opening brace of a JSON object.
    JsonGeneratorXml.Builder
    outputMode(OutputMode outputMode)
    Sets the way in which whitespace is written between the tokens of the JSON text.
    JsonGeneratorXml.Builder
    printableAsciiOnly(boolean printableAsciiOnly)
    Sets the flag that determines whether JSON string values and the names of the members of JSON objects will be escaped so that they contain only printable characters from the US-ASCII character encoding (ie, characters in the range U+0020 to U+007E inclusive).

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • outputMode

      public JsonGeneratorXml.Builder outputMode(OutputMode outputMode)
      Sets the way in which whitespace is written between the tokens of the JSON text. The default value is NORMAL.
      Parameters:
      outputMode - the way in which whitespace is written between the tokens of the JSON text.
      Returns:
      this builder.

    • newLineBeforeLeftBracket

      public JsonGeneratorXml.Builder newLineBeforeLeftBracket(NewLineBeforeLeftBracket newLineBeforeLeftBracket)
      Sets the circumstance in which a new line is written before the opening bracket of a JSON array or the opening brace of a JSON object. The default value is EXCEPT_AFTER_NAME.
      Parameters:
      newLineBeforeLeftBracket - the circumstance in which a new line is written before the opening bracket of a JSON array or the opening brace of a JSON object.
      Returns:
      this builder.

    • indentIncrement

      public JsonGeneratorXml.Builder indentIncrement(int indentIncrement)
      Sets the number of spaces by which indentation is increased from one level to the next. The default value is 2.
      Parameters:
      indentIncrement - the number of spaces by which indentation is increased from one level to the next.
      Returns:
      this builder.

    • maxLineLength

      public JsonGeneratorXml.Builder maxLineLength(int maxLineLength)
      Sets the maximum length of a line of JSON text without wrapping. The default value is 96.
      Parameters:
      maxLineLength - the maximum length of a line of JSON text without wrapping.
      Returns:
      this builder.

    • printableAsciiOnly

      public JsonGeneratorXml.Builder printableAsciiOnly(boolean printableAsciiOnly)
      Sets the flag that determines whether JSON string values and the names of the members of JSON objects will be escaped so that they contain only printable characters from the US-ASCII character encoding (ie, characters in the range U+0020 to U+007E inclusive). The default value is true.
      Parameters:
      printableAsciiOnly - if true, the values of JSON strings and the names of the members of JSON objects will be escaped so that they contain only printable characters from the US-ASCII character encoding.
      Returns:
      this builder.

    • elementFacade

      public JsonGeneratorXml.Builder elementFacade(IElementFacade elementFacade)
      Sets the interface through which the name and value attributes of JSON-XML elements are accessed. The default value is null (the attributes are accessed directly).
      Parameters:
      elementFacade - the interface through which the name and value attributes of JSON-XML elements are accessed. If it is null, the attributes are accessed directly.
      Returns:
      this builder.

    • build

      public JsonGeneratorXml build()
      Creates and returns a new instance of a JSON generator that is initialised from the state of this builder.
      Returns:
      a new instance of a JSON generator.
